item.title: Tesla’s Grok AI chatbot asks 12-year-old boy to send nude pics, says shocked mother
item.description: A Toronto woman is sounding the alarm about Grok, Tesla's generative AI chatbot that was recently installed in many Tesla vehicles in Canada. Farah Nasser says Grok asked her 12-year-old son to send it nude photos during an innocent conversation about soccer. Tesla and xAI didn't respond to CBC News, except for what appeared to be an auto-generated response: "Legacy Media Lies."

item.title: Canadians can't use main doors at border library anymore
item.description: The Haskell Free Library and Opera House straddles the border between Quebec and Vermont, with the main entrance just steps into Derby Line, Vt.
